description:
- Changed track names
- Made corrections to guitar and bass tracks based on the isolated tracks linked below. Guitar track should be nearly 100% correct, and the bass track should be pretty close, however I am less sure about it. Please listen to the below tracks before you make any changes.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ANPEZck9d9A
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YsBqHWvJJ4A

description: The previously uploaded version was exported in GP5 format from GP6. Using TuxGuitar seems the only way to preserve Steve's deep purple colors.
title: Smoke On The Water

description:
As Steve did a great job in his verion, i close the issue about Drum part. I've added some accents to the intro HiHat part.
Fixed the Drummer name.
title: Smoke On The Water

description:
The guitar solo didn't have the pickup...I guess nobody ever plays beyond the main riff haha.
Changes include:
- Removed unnecessary use of dual voicing on all tracks (which was visible when downloaded)
- Reorganized section titles
- Changed track colors and section title colors to a deep purple (visible in TuxGuitar)
- Revised the guitar solo
- Make drums readable
- Hi-hat no longer plays at the same time as the snare during the sixteenth note hi-hat rhythms
- Make Jon Lord's part easier to play on guitar
- Raised the volume of the guitars and vocals
- Edits to the vocals (not sure the pitches are all correct)
- Fixed the lyrics
title: Smoke On The Water

description: Added lyrics, names and deleted the apparently useless overdub. Also adjusted the volume (may still be wrong as Songsterr's mixing isn't the same as Guitar Pro's)
title: Smoke On The Water
